name: Crazy Drivers In Sun Town: MiniCars
name_original: Crazy Drivers In Sun Town: MiniCars
description:
Crazy Drivers In Sun Town: MiniCars

Mayor of Sun City: Our vehicles shrunk because of a manufacturing problem, the bigger vehicles cannot be repaired anymore, if this was our biggest problem, our citizens would be alot saver, because not one of our citizens owns a Drivers License.

NOTE: This is the first version of the game, development just started

Version 0.1 [Added AI Traffic & More, Contact me on Discord if you have Game-Idea's!] [@DeadEagle#9730]
